item.title: Asterisk syntax highlighting extension for Visual Studio Code
item.description: I’ve started using Microsoft’s new Visual Studio Code text editor at work and it’s pretty neat. I like it more than the Brackets editor that I was using before. It’s similar, but more polished and has some excellent features like an integrated terminal and a debugger. As you might expect there is a comprehensive extension repository but once again there was no syntax highlighter for Asterisk dialplan code so I took it upon myself to fill the void and wrote one.
